title: Irresistible Dreams
description: Book 1 The Cleopatra Aspect begins the story of Tia Sanchez, a beautiful young entrepreneur, who accompanies her best friend Julia to Dubai where her friend experiences a humiliating encounter. Tia vows never to give herself up for anything less than love, instead focusing on her ambitions to become a world class day spa owner. She sets out to expand her empire in Amalfi Coast, Italy where she will meet badboy hotelier Enrico Castello.
author: A.J. Channing
